title: Remember when Taric was gay?
body:
https://i.imgur.com/SchqOWy.png

And Ezreal was gay.

And Malzahar gave space aids.

Garen and Lux...

And then there was SSOTP https://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=SSoTP

Fiora/LeBlanc were bad, but they were actually was really good, people just said it so no one would play them because they were frustrating.

Champions used to have a shared community wide personality of their own that transcended what was directly communicated from the game itself. Well you know what? Illaoi is a lesbian. She's the perfect lesbian. I can totally see her get into a relationship with Neeko. You know, sometimes you see those lesbians who have manly features? Yeah, that's Illaoi.

https://i.imgur.com/prsiMVs.png
